Module kivakit.primitive.collections
Package com.telenav.kivakit.primitive.collections.array.bits.io.input

Class BaseBitReader

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.primitive.collections.array.bits.io.input.BaseBitReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
BitReader, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BitInput
public abstract class BaseBitReader extends Object implements BitReader
Reads bits from some sequence of bytes.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
